price: 6. Arrinkani waxaa ugu wacan in Alle Xaq yahay, oo uu nooleeyo meytida, iyo inuu wax walba Karo.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلۡحَقُّ وَأَنَّهُۥ يُحۡيِ ٱلۡمَوۡتَىٰ وَأَنَّهُۥ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٞ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: dhālika bi-anna al-laha huwa al-ḥaqu wa-annahu yuḥ'yī al-mawtā wa-annahu ʿalā kulli shayin qadīrun
